scripts.test:watch: docker-compose exec server npm run test:watch
scripts.test:coverage: docker-compose exec server npm run test:coverage
scripts.db:generate: docker-compose exec server npm run db:generate
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec server npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate:generate: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:generate
scripts.openapi:generate: docker-compose exec server curl -o src/openapi/openapi.json http://localhost:3000/openapi.json
scripts.setup: npm run install:server && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:generate
